isNextToFallPrevention

public static boolean isNextToFallPrevention(org.bukkit.Location loc)
Get whether the location is next to a block whose fall is prevented.

Parameters:
loc - The location to check.
Returns:
Whether the location is next to a block whose fall is prevented.

putFallPrevention

public static void putFallPrevention(org.bukkit.Location location)
Add the location to the list of blocks that shouldn't fall. The block's fall is prevented until after 200 times the block per block replacement interval.

Parameters:
location - The block's location.

isUpdatePrevented

public static boolean isUpdatePrevented(CreeperBlock block)
Get whether the location is next to a block whose update is prevented.

Parameters:
block - The block to check.
Returns:
Whether the location is next to a block whose update is prevented.

putUpdatePrevention

public static void putUpdatePrevention(CreeperBlock block)
Add the location to the list of blocks that shouldn't be updated. The block's updates are prevented until after 200 times the block per block replacement interval.

Parameters:
block - The block.
